snippet.title: SingStar® Dance Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
For all you dancing machines and superstars in the making, get ready to show off your best moves! Sing* and dance** to the hottest pop hits with SingStar® Dance. Featuring a selection of sizzling new music tracks as well as the best classic pop tunes, SingStar® Dance lets up to four players challenge each other to see who makes the best singing and dancing duo.
* USB microphone required to play this game. The SingStar® Dance Party Pack includes two Official SingStar® Microphones and a SingStar® USB Converter. 
* * Dance functionality requires PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera (both sold separately). 

 © 2010 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.  SingStar is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.  Developed by SCEE London Studio.
